resources.label: Professional Engineering License
resources.definition: A state-issued credential authorizing an individual to practice engineering and seal documents
resources.function: Authorizes professional engineering practice and document sealing

resources.label: AI Language Processing Software
resources.definition: Open-source artificial intelligence software capable of generating text based on prompts and input data
resources.function: Generate draft report text from input information
resources.source_text: open-sourced artificial intelligence (AI) software to create an initial draft

resources.label: AI-Assisted Drafting Tools
resources.definition: Software tools that use AI to generate engineering drawings, layouts, and technical specifications
resources.source_text: AI-assisted drafting tools to generate preliminary design documents

resources.label: Groundwater Monitoring Data
resources.definition: Technical data collected from observation of groundwater conditions at a specific site over time
resources.function: Basis for environmental analysis and report
resources.source_text: analysis of groundwater monitoring data from a site Engineer A had been observing for over a year

resources.label: Professional Journal Articles
resources.definition: Peer-reviewed technical literature used for fact verification and professional reference
resources.function: Cross-check and verify AI-generated content accuracy
resources.source_text: cross-checking key facts against professional journal articles

resources.label: Professional Seal
resources.definition: An official stamp or mark that an engineer applies to documents to certify professional responsibility
resources.function: Certify professional responsibility for sealed documents
resources.source_text: applied their seal consistent with state law

resources.label: Client-Provided Information
resources.definition: Project data and requirements provided by the client for engineering work
resources.function: Input data for report and design preparation
resources.source_text: relevant information provided by Client W
